item.description:
o	0 - First file to generate data from scratch
	Expeted result : all hours set to OUI
o	1-First file dropped to generate data
	Expected result : everything is saved (all hours set to OUI)
o	2  Same file dropped with the following changes :

Nothing changed for 9AM
o	3  Same file dropped with the following changes :
METMOY 8h has its value changed (90,63 to 91.63)
9AM is changed PCSMOY will be CS (quality = to the previous one)
PCSMOY is set to 6/7/8AM AF, rest are set to CS
PCSMOY is unchanged for 678, for rest of the hours, they are set to AF
